title: Internet Speed Test
whatsnew:
• ✅ Official launch of the Internet Speed Test web app

  • 📉 One-click testing for download, upload, and ping

  • 📱 Optimized UI for mobile and desktop experience

  • 🌍 Supports testing across various network types (Wi-Fi, 4G, broadband, etc.)
longDescription:
Internet Speed Test by dhimanp is a lightweight, browser-based tool designed to accurately measure your internet connection performance — anytime, anywhere. Whether you're troubleshooting slow speeds, comparing networks, or optimizing your setup, this app delivers clear results in seconds.

With a simple click, test your download speed, upload speed, ping (latency), and connection stability in real time. Built for ease of use, it works seamlessly on both desktop and mobile devices without requiring any downloads or installations.

🚀 Key Features:

  • 📶 Real-time download and upload speed test

  • 🕒 Instant ping and latency measurements

  • 🧪 Reliable and consistent performance metrics

  • 🌐 100% browser-based — no app install required

  • 📱 Fully responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop

  • 🔐 Safe and private — no personal data collected

Whether you're a student, gamer, remote worker, or casual user, DhimanP’s Internet Speed Test is your quick and trustworthy connectivity checker.
